thread.title: Perfect place for 1 night stay!
thread.title_full: Perfect place for 1 night stay! - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marais Grands Boulevards, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Charlotte A
title: Perfect place for 1 night stay!
text: My boyfriend surprised me for our 5 year anniversary to a night in Paris. He got a very good price and I could not fault this hotel, appeared way more expensive than it was, very luxurious and staff were excellent. Location also very good!
